mapper.insert: insert into member_info ( mi_id, mi_pw, mi_name, mi_email, mi_mobile, mi_birthday, mi_tell, mi_addr )values( #{mi_id}, #{mi_pw}, #{mi_name}, #{mi_email}, #{mi_mobile}, #{mi_birthday}, #{mi_tell}, #{mi_addr} )
mapper.select: select * from member_info where mi_id = #{mi_id} and mi_pw = #{mi_pw}
mapper.update: update member_info set mi_pw = #{mi_pw} , mi_name = #{mi_name}, mi_email = #{mi_email}, mi_mobile = #{mi_mobile}, mi_birthday = #{mi_birthday}, mi_tell = #{mi_tell}, mi_addr = #{mi_addr} where mi_id = #{mi_id}
